reviews.review:
[i] I really like this game, but I can't recommend for people who are coming from CS:GO [/i]
[h1] Quick Review [/h1]
Very fun and interesting for those who've never played old source games before, or those who want some nostalgia of older games. (For people like me who were introduced to the game by Global Offensive)

People still play it, it's still very fun.

$9.99? No. CS:GO's free now, I'd pay $5-$7, but wouldn't recommend at $10 if you're not going to put serious hours into this game.

[u]For those who've never played it:[/u]
[list]
[*] No skins
[*] Way worse mechanics
[*] Pretty bad graphics in this day and age
[/list]

So yea, get it when it goes on sale unless you're dying to get it. It's extremely fun and a new taste from Global Offensive.

6.2/10 | Get it if you want it.
J√≥ j√°t√©k mivel h√°t ugye counter strike:D

This game is the perfect balance between fun and serious. You have maps that are designed for fun and others that are for serious.

 For example Ba_jail, in which one team plays as the cops and the others as prisoners. The prisoners have to do what the cops tell them to do or be killed, Now that isn't to say that you can't defy does orders and try to sneak away and get a gun to kill them with.

Zombies. We all know what this gamemode is. You try to survive for as long as possible, But there is also Zombie adventure maps, in which you have to get to the end of the map to win, unless you are a zombie.

Trikz. You might not know what this game mode is but it is real fun. 
This mode is all about teamwork, you cannot play this alone. So what you had to do was to boost your team up onto a platform by the means of a flashbang, yes a flashbang. If you didn't know you could throw a flashbang at your teamate as they were jumping over you to launch theme either straight up in the air or forward, if they were running.Once they are up on the platform they could open up a path for you and you redo it untill the end.

Gungame. We all know this mode aswell but if you don't for whatever reason i will explain.
You start with a pistol or which ever weapon that the host set it to. Every kill or every other kill gets you a new gun that you have to use to kill with. You do that untill you get the last gun, which usually is the knife.

There are more maps dedicated to those who just wanna play for fun, now i am not saying that you can't play a normal mode and have fun.

I just wanna say that it is sad how fast it died when Cs:go Came out and it is still pretty much dead to this day.

The game could actually have a future ... But you've wasted that chance! The game has great graphics but does not have a good gameplay, so how does Rick? The game has no console! (What you have in Cs 1.6, Cs Source and CS: GO pressing on the apostrophe), the game has no way to swap weapons quickly! How so? You know ... IT'S VERY BAD TO CHANGE THE WEAPONS IN THE BUTTON. IT'S MUCH BETTER TO CHOOSE WHICH GUN YOU WILL CHANGE, EXAMPLE: 1, 2, 3 FOR WEAPONS 4 FOR THE GRENADES AND 5 FOR THE PUMP), I know Valve will not read but I'll try anyway.
